title: EBSI Accredited Verifiable Attestation Record
description: Schema of an EBSI Accredited Verifiable Attestation

termsOfUse.description: Property. Contains the terms under which the Accredited Verifiable Attestation was issued

id.description: Property. Contains a URL that points to where more information about this instance of terms of use can be found.

type.description: Property. Defines the type of terms of use.

credentialSubject.description: Property. Defines information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Attestation

id.description: Property. Defines the DID of the subject that is described by the Verifiable Attestation
